input.sentences: today we had a color scavenger hunt at my school . i found a red chair for red .

green trees meant another one down .

output.sentences: The school had a scavenger hunt, red was one of the colors of the seven colors
first the children found yellow flowers
then the children found brown but meant to find green, luckily the trees had both
next they had to cross a road near the very blue ocean
a kid got lost but the remaining children found a rainbow
